title: Digital Agriculture Guide
summary: Comprehensive guide to digital tools for farmers
description: A practical guide covering mobile apps, weather services, and market platforms that can help farmers improve productivity and access markets.

title: Food Security Metrics Framework
summary: Framework for measuring food security indicators
description: This document outlines a standardized framework for collecting and analyzing food security data, designed for use by researchers and policymakers.

title: Community Seed Bank Toolkit
summary: Step-by-step guide for establishing seed banks
description: A detailed toolkit providing communities with the knowledge and resources needed to establish and maintain local seed banks.
